segments.text: Waiter , bring me the menu , will you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a moment , I'm coming . ( ten minutes later ) . Now , what would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to see the menu . Would you get me one , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Ah ! But this is in French . Would you mind giving me the English menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's written in English too , in smaller print . There .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I'll need a while to choose . Could you come back in a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . ( five minutes later ) Now , what are you having ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , I haven't decided yet . Do you mind giving me a couple of minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , but would you be so kind as to make up your mind soon ? We're very busy just now as you can see , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
